categories: Category:Members of the Spice Runners of Kijimi

nodes.text: Jarraban was a male member of the Spice Runners of Kijimi, a spicerunner gang who operated on the planet Kijimi. He was the right-hand man of Zorii Bliss, the leader of the gang. When the Spice Runners attempted to escape Kijimi after Poe Dameron of the Resistance, a former member of the gang, alerted First Order forces on Kijimi to their presence, Jarraban was killed by Ap'lek, a member of the Knights of Ren.
